name: Space Invaders (itch) (Shiro_Port)
description:
This is my 2DShooter project. I have modify following Things:

  1. Main Menu background
  2. Created 3 Levels with multiple enemies to kill.
  3. Added a brief controls instructions to the instruction tab on main menu. 
  4. Change name on the main menu to Space Invaders!
  5. slighted change the UI for score and high score (Shifted high score to the right side of the screen and change colors)

Credits: 

Created by Shivam Hire (a.k.a Shiro_Port)
